data.lyric:
[ti:]
[ar:]
[al:]
[by:时间戳工具V2.0_20200810]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Numb Little Bug - Em Beihold
[00:03.60]Lyrics by：Emily Beihold/Nick Lopez/Andrew Decaro
[00:07.20]Composed by：Emily Beihold/Nick Lopez/Andrew Decaro
[00:10.80]I don't feel a single thing 
[00:13.32]
[00:13.92]Have the pills done too much 
[00:16.23]
[00:16.83]Haven't caught up with my friends in weeks 
[00:19.86]And now we're outta touch 
[00:22.50]I've been drivin' in LA 
[00:24.27]
[00:25.23]And the world it feels too big 
[00:27.27]
[00:28.11]Like a floating ball that's bound to break 
[00:30.87]Snap my psyche like a twig 
[00:33.69]And I just wanna see 
[00:35.76]If you feel the same as me 
[00:38.64]Do you ever get a little bit tired of life 
[00:41.49]Like you're not really happy but you don't wanna die 
[00:44.37]Like you're hangin' by a thread but you gotta survive 
[00:47.19]'Cause you gotta survive 
[00:48.84]
[00:50.04]Like your body's in the room but you're not really there 
[00:52.68]Like you have empathy inside but you don't really care 
[00:55.65]Like you're fresh outta love but it's been in the air 
[00:58.53]Am I past repair 
[01:00.15]
[01:00.84]A little bit tired of trying to care when I don't 
[01:05.70]
[01:06.45]A little bit tired of quick repairs to cope 
[01:11.40]
[01:12.09]A little bit tired of sinkin' there's water in my boat 
[01:15.72]I'm barely breathin' tryna stay afloat 
[01:18.42]So I got these quick repairs to cope 
[01:22.65]
[01:23.52]Guess I'm just broken and broke 
[01:25.26]
[01:27.42]The prescription's on its way 
[01:29.37]
[01:30.15]With a name I can't pronounce 
[01:33.00]And the dose I gotta take 
[01:35.07]
[01:35.88]Boy I wish that I could count 
[01:38.73]'Cause I just wanna see 
[01:40.80]If this could make me happy 
[01:43.53]Do you ever get a little bit tired of life 
[01:46.41]Like you're not really happy but you don't wanna die 
[01:49.23]Like you're hangin' by a thread but you gotta survive 
[01:52.14]'Cause you gotta survive 
[01:53.82]
[01:54.96]Like your body's in the room but you're not really there 
[01:57.60]Like you have empathy inside but you don't really care 
[02:00.57]Like you're fresh out of love but it's been in the air 
[02:03.48]Am I past repair 
[02:05.10]
[02:05.79]A little bit tired of trying to care when I don't 
[02:10.74]
[02:11.40]A little bit tired of quick repairs to cope 
[02:16.29]
[02:17.04]A little bit tired of sinkin' there's water in my boat 
[02:20.70]I'm barely breathin' tryna stay afloat 
[02:23.37]So I got these quick repairs to cope 
[02:27.60]
[02:28.80]Do you ever get a little bit tired of life 
[02:31.89]Like you're not really happy but you don't wanna die 
[02:35.04]Like a numb little bug that's gotta survive 
[02:38.22]That's gotta survive
data.trans:
[ti:]
[ar:]
[al:]
[by:时间戳工具V2.0_20200810]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.60]//
[00:07.20]//
[00:10.80]我没有任何的感觉
[00:13.32]
[00:13.92]吃了太多的药
[00:16.23]
[00:16.83]数周没有见我的朋友们
[00:19.86]现在我们渐渐失去联系
[00:22.50]我驱车畅游洛杉矶
[00:24.27]
[00:25.23]感觉世界无边无际
[00:27.27]
[00:28.11]像只注定要破裂的浮球
[00:30.87]像折断树枝般 掐灭我的灵魂
[00:33.69]我只是想知道
[00:35.76]你是否与我有同感
[00:38.64]你曾否厌倦生活呢
[00:41.49]就是你感觉不开心 但是你也不愿离开这个世界
[00:44.37]就像你在崩溃边缘 但你得要寻找出路
[00:47.19]因你得要寻找出路
[00:48.84]
[00:50.04]就像是你的躯体仍在 但是你的灵魂已飘离 
[00:52.68]就像是你的内心空洞 但你不以为然
[00:55.65]就像是你丧失了爱的能力 但是爱随处可见
[00:58.53]我的心是否已经无法被修补
[01:00.15]
[01:00.84]当我毫不在乎 厌倦了强迫自己去重视
[01:05.70]
[01:06.45]当出现问题时 厌倦了迅速去应对 
[01:11.40]
[01:12.09]水漫上了我的船只 厌倦了一直在下沉
[01:15.72]我快要无法呼吸 试着漂浮在水面
[01:18.42]所以我迅速应对这情况
[01:22.65]
[01:23.52]我想我是破碎的 又身无分文 
[01:25.26]
[01:27.42]医生在开处方
[01:29.37]
[01:30.15]我无法念出这名字 
[01:33.00]我要服用这些剂量的药
[01:35.07]
[01:35.88]男孩 我希望我能细数这些药
[01:38.73]因我只想知道
[01:40.80]这是否会让我开心起来
[01:43.53]你曾否厌倦生活呢
[01:46.41]就是你感觉不开心 但是你也不愿离开这个世界
[01:49.23]就像你在崩溃边缘 但你得要寻找出路
[01:52.14]因你得要寻找出路
[01:53.82]
[01:54.96]就像是你的躯体仍在 但是你的灵魂已飘离 
[01:57.60]就像是你的内心空洞 但你不以为然
[02:00.57]就像是你丧失了爱的能力 但是爱随处可见
[02:03.48]我的心是否已经无法被修补
[02:05.10]
[02:05.79]当我毫不在乎 厌倦了强迫自己去重视
[02:10.74]
[02:11.40]当出现问题时 厌倦了迅速去应对 
[02:16.29]
[02:17.04]水漫上了我的船只 厌倦了一直在下沉
[02:20.70]我快要无法呼吸 试着漂浮在水面
[02:23.37]所以我迅速应对这情况
[02:27.60]
[02:28.80]你曾否厌倦生活呢
[02:31.89]就是你感觉不开心 但是你也不愿离开这个世界
[02:35.04]像一只得要寻求出路的麻木的小虫子
[02:38.22]得要寻求出路
